CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: The Bank Of New York Mellon Corporation

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 240 GREENWICH STREET, NEW YORK, New York, 10286, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: BNY Mellon is a global investment company involved in managing and servicing financial assets throughout the investment lifecycle. The bank provides financial services for institutions, corporations, and individual investors and delivers investment management and investment services in 35 countries and more than 100 markets. BNY Mellon is the largest global custody bank in the world, with about $41.1 trillion in under custody and administration (as of Dec. 31, 2020), and can act as a single point of contact for clients looking to create, trade, hold, manage, service, distribute, or restructure investments. BNY Mellon's asset-management division manages about $2.2 trillion in assets.
